website_summaries.verdict: Albeit available at a premium rate, the Ecco Soft 7 Slip On is appreciated by many customers because of its undeniable comfort and style. Aside from being fashionable and comfortable, it is also functional.It has cushioning impact and arch support that are lauded by wearers who suffer from plantar fasciitis and other foot issues. It also has a roomy toe area which is appreciated by people with wide feet. Others perceived it to run large, so sizing ½ to one full size down is suggested for a snug fit.
pros: A significant number of buyers have lauded the Ecco Soft 7 Slip On’s stylish silhouette
This kind of Ecco Soft sneakers is perfect for walking or standing all day, according to a few customers like a pregnant woman and a teacher
Some buyers have noted that it is among the Ecco shoes that are made of durable materials
Several of Ecco’s followers find the shoe very comfortable for all-day wear
They can wear it without feeling any typical foot fatigue or stress
Several people with plantar fasciitis attested that the Ecco Soft 7 Slip On has outstanding cushioning
They didn’t feel pain when wearing it all day
The shoe has plenty of room for the toe which is perfect for people with wide feet, as appreciated by a good number of users including someone who has a bunion
A reviewer mentions that the slip-on is water-resistant
It also dried quickly during several downpours
The shoe accommodates feet with high arches, as per a couple of Ecco patrons
An individual has shared that the sneaker is easy to clean
Because of the shoe’s trendy design, a commenter has noted that she often receives compliments when wearing it
cons: Someone who uses an orthotic says that the slip-on is a bit tight on the tongue area within the first few uses
A couple of clients have commented that the shoe fits wide in the heel, so it slips off

customer_reviews.title: Wrong size & no leather lining
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these ECCO Men's Soft 7 Slip in my size 43. These shoes fit up to one size too large. In addition the lining was not leather as in description. These ECCO shoes were incorrectly designed by incompetent shoe designers. Unlike the lace up shoes, slip on shoes don't have a tongue or laces and need to compensate for that, only then they will fit properly. When I buy ECCO lace up shoes I always use Pedag insoles for a much better fitting and greater comfort. Unfortunately even with Pedag insoles these shoes were too large and would not fit right. Will be returning them!
customer_reviews.author: David shinder

customer_reviews.title: I like the fit
customer_reviews.text: I like the fit , size 46 , the wife gave it the cute shoe thumbs up. I can wear this shoe all day and my feet still feel good. Good insole support. I went to the ECCO web site and the black/black is supposed to be black upper and a black band on the bottom . This shoe was listed as black/black but is black upper and a white band as pictured. Sole is kind of an amber color. Kind of bummed I didn't get the black/black but a great price and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: ROBERT H SMITH

customer_reviews.title: cheapo for ecco
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty cheaply made for ecco, hard to recommend. I found the sizing between the left and right shoes to be rather different, with the right shoe being really loose and the left consistent with sizing of other ecco shoes. While I still love my other ecco shoes, I'd stay away from this model, something is just off about them.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Dot Danger

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!
customer_reviews.text: A first for me...I receive my new shoes and looked forward to wearing them the next day at work. I open the box to find two completely different shoes. AMAZING!!!
customer_reviews.author: Iris

customer_reviews.title: Sizing has changed, returned.  They are larger than in the past.
customer_reviews.text: Ecco seems to have gotten a larger foot measurement. I have Worn their shoes for 20 plus years. Everyday I wear Their shoes. I am on my second return. I tried A different style. It was too large as well. If anything my foot has gotten larger.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Modern style and comfy
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a shoe that I could ride my bike to work, meet with senior staff, and hike about town. I've been a Clark's shoe fan for years...but now love Ecco!
customer_reviews.author: VSH

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love ECCO shoes and these slip ons are no exception! They look great and feel great!
customer_reviews.author: Dan Peterson

customer_reviews.title: comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Hard to fit feet to shoes I'm not familiar with. I can wear a 9.5 to 10. A friend said these ran small so I ordered ten and it's too loose. I put inserts in and it helps. comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Richard A. Stouvenel

customer_reviews.title: My favorite brand
customer_reviews.text: Fits like a glove. Very comfortable. I can wear them all day and don't even feel them. I am long time Ecco customer and I will keep buying...
customer_reviews.author: Christo Valiotis

customer_reviews.title: ECCO’s 4 all occasions!
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure how many pairs of ECCO brand shoes I own ? 3 pairs of Sandals, 2 boots, 5 dress shoes and these pair of casual shoes are probably my 7th or 8th pair. Once you start wearing ECCO’s it’s the only brand shoe you will ever wear !
customer_reviews.author: NYCABI

customer_reviews.title: best fitting shoe
customer_reviews.text: this brand of shoe never disappoints me, the fit, the comfort, the feel, all of it is in harmony with the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and good looking
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were purchased for my husband. He really likes them. They are attractive and very comfortable. True to Ecco.
customer_reviews.author: Soup

customer_reviews.title: No break-in period needed...
customer_reviews.text: At least that’s been my experience. As always, a fine quality product! WTG ECCO!
customer_reviews.author: Josie

customer_reviews.title: ECCO quality
customer_reviews.text: The fit and comfort of ECCO shoes is reliably good. My only disappointment with these is that the color is not a rich brown as depicted in the photo and the sole is a tad too thick for my taste.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Hall

customer_reviews.title: Quality shoe
customer_reviews.text: Easy to slip on and very comfortable. I will buy more shoes from ECCO. Expensive but in this case everything I wanted and worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Barbara J Springer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed Nice soft
customer_reviews.text: Ecco shoes always fit right out of the box This pair slips off when I try to walk. Disappointed Nice soft leather
customer_reviews.author: EWS

customer_reviews.title: Total Comfort
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable shoe I’ve ever worn. Wore them all day with full total comfort. Look good as well.
customer_reviews.author: fly like an eagle

customer_reviews.title: Ecco has lost consistency in sizing
customer_reviews.text: Bought the size I usually ordered. It was way to big. had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Rich Aug

customer_reviews.title: Order a Size Smaller than Normal
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived on time and were new; however, shoes large for the equivalent of a size 10. I normally wear a size 10 1/2 and these shoes ones too big. Whejnwalking in them they tend to slip off and this are uncomfortable. Ecco is a great brand but for whatever reason these were too large for a size 10.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and comfortable but there is better than this shoe
customer_reviews.author: AHMAD

customer_reviews.title: Runs big
customer_reviews.text: I love Ecco shoes. All have been true to size(5pairs). These are so big they don't even stay on my foot. I will continue buying Ecco.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite shoes!!
customer_reviews.text: My new favorite shoes and I am on the lookout for similar in different colors. Cannot believe I am almost 60 and am now just discovering Ecco shoes. THANK YOU!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Mallalieu

customer_reviews.title: Shoes are light and comfortable if not a little large
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are light and comfortable if not a little large,loose fitting for a "sneaker". Comfort for summer wearing, or house shoes; fun, comfy casual
customer_reviews.author: Louis

customer_reviews.title: Happy with these as well
customer_reviews.text: Big fan of Ecco slip ons. Happy with these as well.
customer_reviews.author: pianophile

customer_reviews.title: Good value comfortable but had to purchase heel liners and ...
customer_reviews.text: Good value comfortable but had to purchase heel liners and still a little loose. Not the case with other 12.5
customer_reviews.author: mark d sturbois

customer_reviews.title: The Price is beautiful. BUT when I received the package
customer_reviews.text: The sieze is ok.The Price is beautiful. BUT when I received the package, I found the shoes had been used. I don't know what's happen.
customer_reviews.author: shenruilin

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice product but sized incorrectly. US size 6.5 usually corresponds to EU size 39 not 40.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Versatile comfort
customer_reviews.text: Used on a cruise for smart casual dressing, but it still looked good with a suit. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Pasuezq

customer_reviews.title: Hurricane Irma couldn't stop Amazon from keeping its promise !!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value and very comfortable. Shipping was timely even with impending hurricane.
customer_reviews.author: JJ Putz

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Usually happy with Ecco but these seemed to fit a little large
customer_reviews.author: JLWeed

customer_reviews.title: Great style and comfort
customer_reviews.text: Great style and comfort. Their sizing is off from American sizes. I wear an American 10.5, but their 9.0-9.5 fits perfectly for me. I have received many complements for the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Williams

customer_reviews.title: Stylish yet durable
customer_reviews.text: I just came back from Africa, so i was wearing these shoes for all ocasions all the ! It has style, comfortable, sporty. What impresed me was how you can clean it with a wet cloth!
customer_reviews.author: ayan suleiman

product_meta.title: ECCO Men's Soft 7 Slip On Trainers
product_meta.description: Embracing ECCO's core values, the Soft 7 sneaker is a celebration of Scandinavian design with an understated, contemporary twist.
